entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
